metadata.title: Xit XTCF1 Universal Manual Flash (Black)
description: Xit XTCF1 Universal manual flash is perfect for your basic flash needs. It has a guide # of 46-Feet at ISO 100. It takes 2 AA batteries. Flash duration of 1/1000 sec. and a color temperature of 5600-Degree K (daylight). It weighs only 2.3 oz. and is 3.6 x 2.3 x 1.2 Inches. It has an angle of coverage of 38-Degree vertical and 55-Degree horizontal.
